alert.note: Alert for Concho; Runnels; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 5:41PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Tom Green, south central Runnels and northwestern Concho Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 540 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lowake, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lowake around 550 PM CDT. Rowena around 600 PM CDT. Ballinger around 620 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Us-83 Near The Concho- Runnels County Line, The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Ranch Road 1929 and The Intersection Of Ranch Road 380 And Ranch Road 381. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
